body: i feel bad for shizuka to keep their relationship alive but to no avail, she really has some patience but to stay and try to give him 8 chances is too much. if he did not learn after the 3rd time at least then forget him. i would love to have a woman like her.  I do hope this might continue.

@Arethwyn

And even if he did, she's an idiot for giving him an "8th" chance lol.
Your girlfriend asks you if you want to go to dinner and you go 'nah, gonna go play games.' In reality this kinda guy wouldn't have gotten a girlfriend in the first place. :< whatajerkface
im not into ntr, but this is decent, the guy didnt deserve her anyway, why should she waste her time on a guy who doesnt even appreciate her. i ship the two.

yup that's right boi say it out loud! thank you for ruining my childhood! BUT, this isn't a complaint lol. nobita is such an asshole now huh? fuck him, shizuka. no, i mean like, FUCK him! you know. you should fuck takeshi the giant instead and make this series keep cumming or whatever.
well damn nobita is an ass, i feel bad for shizuka to keep their relationship alive but to no avail, guess she's better off with gorilla-kun
it's not like the other guy is likeable
